TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Medusa. You must try again.
You have defeated the Medusa. You retrieve some blood with which to sign the documents.
You have succeeded! Jarl and Jotun give you all the items they no longer want.
You must approach Jarl and Jotun and see if they can reach a truce.
You must travel to Werret to find a Medusa and to Gruuldok to get some Griffonskin.
You must return to the Giants' Walk to meet with Jarl and Jotun.
